title: How to disable call screen on Pixel 2XL
content: Randomly call screen pops up on my phone when a person, in my contacts list, calls me. I have the call screen feature turned off, as per https://support.google.com/phoneapp/answer/9118387?hl=en. However it still appears from time to time. Is there anything else I can do to disable this feature on my Pixel phone?
